== Technical specifications for Ubuntu 10.10 Server Edition ==

This document is for Ubuntu 10.10. For other releases please visit the <nowiki>[[..-|technical specifications overview]]</nowiki> page.  

Ubuntu Server Edition is meant to run on any Intel or AMD x86, AMD_64, EM_64T processor. It requires a minimum of 192Mb of RAM and 1Gb of disk  space. Depending on your needs, you might manage with less than this.  However, most users risk being frustrated if they ignore these  suggestions.  

You can see a <nowiki>[[..-new|summary  of all changes since 8.04]]</nowiki>. 

The following is a selection of the common packages packages that are fully maintained on Ubuntu Server Edition 10.10. 

=== Kernels ===
* Default Linux 2.6.35-server (Tickless, No Preemption, Deadline I/O, PAE, 100Hz)

=== Web ===
* Apache 2.2.16 (event/prefork/worker/dev)
* Tomcat 6.0.28

=== Database ===
* MySQL 5.1.49
* PostgreSQL 8.4.7
* couchdb 1.0.1

=== Email ===
* Dovecot 1.2.12
* Postfix 2.7.1
* Exim 4.72
* SpamAssassin 3.3.1
* ClamAV 0.96.3 (0.96.5 in updates)
* amavisd-new 2.6.4

=== Languages ===
* PHP 5.3.3
* Perl 5.10.1
* Python 2.6.6 / 3.1.3
* GCC 4.4.4
* Ruby 1.8.7.299 / 1.9.2.0
* Java 6 (OpenJDK Build b20)

=== Networking ===

* Samba 3.5.4
* OpenLDAP 2.4.23 (cn=config)
* OpenVPN 2.1.0
* FreeRadius 2.1.9

=== Monitoring ===

=== Configuration management ===

=== Cloud computing ===

* cloud-utils 0.16
